title: This Family Home Feels Like Its Floating Above The Treetops
description: Perched in the treetops in Melbourne’s bushy northeast, Silvertop House is a new family home with a sustainable edge. Ben Callery Architects designed the house to settle into Eltham’s natural surroundings, drawing inspiration from the design vernacular, leafy landscapes, and history of environmentally responsive buildings.
author: The Design Files
